name: pb makes lunch
description:
(pb makes lunch)
brisk mornings & odd neighbors.
being a polar bear is tough.

x, esc, numpad 0 : cancel/menu
z, enter, space : confirm/action
move with arrow keys

this is the first project i've ever finished & shared.
i made it in about 3 days for the polar bear jam, but then i missed the deadline. so i cleaned it up a little bit, blahblah. everything was made by me. 
hope you like it!
